original_text: Take double the money with you. Carry back with you the money that was returned in the mouth of your sacks. Perhaps it was an oversight.
korean_text: 너희 손에 갑절의 돈을 가지고 너희 자루 아귀에 도로 넣어져 있던 그 돈을 다시 가지고 가라 혹 잘못이 있었을까 두렵도다

sentences.original_text: Take double the money with you.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 돈을 두 배로 가지고 가라.

sentences.original_text: Carry back with you the money
that was returned in the mouth of your sacks.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 자루 아가리에 돌려졌던 그 돈을.
